original_text: And I will multiply on you man and beast, and they shall multiply and be fruitful. And I will cause you to be inhabited as in your former times, and will do more good to you than ever before. Then you will know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 너희 위에 사람과 짐승을 많게 하되 그들의 수가 많고 번성하게 할 것이라 너희 전 지위대로 사람이 거주하게 하여 너희를 처음보다 낫게 대우하리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: And I will multiply on you man and beast
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 위에 사람과 짐승을 번성하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: and they shall multiply and be fruitful
And I will cause you to be inhabited
and will do more good to you
